languages.text: Но лишь сильнее сгустилась тоска, лишая чувств, ибо глубока была печаль породившей ее тени. Тогда чары Вени'Заккари окружили Домин, и они лишь спасли {mf|его|ее}. Ибо страшен тот, кто заблудился в сомнениях своих. Он — есть Смерть.

But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had spawned it. Then Veni'Zacchary's incantation enveloped the Domin, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. He is Death.
languages.original_text: Но лишь сильнее сгустилась тоска, лишая чувств, ибо глубока была печаль породившей ее тени. Тогда чары Вени'Заккари окружили Домин, и они лишь спасли {mf|его|ее}. Ибо страшен тот, кто заблудился в сомнениях своих. Он — есть Смерть.

traits.locale_text: But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had brought it forth. Then Oa'Weisz's sorcery enveloped the Enim, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. Ayen Kaen Dho.

But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had brought it forth. Then Oa'Weisz's sorcery enveloped the Enim, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. Ayen Kaen Dho.

But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had spawned it. Then Oa'Weisz's sorcery enveloped the Enim, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. Ayen Kaen Dho.

But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had spawned it. Then Oa'Weisz's sorcery enveloped the Enim, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. Ayen Kaen Dho.

But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had spawned it. Then Veni'Zacchary's incantation enveloped the Domin, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. He is Death.

But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had spawned it. Then Veni'Zacchary's incantation enveloped the Domin, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. He is Death.

languages.text: Doch {mf|sein|ihr} Kummer verschlimmerte sich nur noch, betäubte jedes Gefühl, denn groß war die Trauer des Schattens, der ihn geboren hatte. Dann umhüllte Veni'Zaccharys Beschwörung {mf|den|die} Domin, und dies allein reichte aus, um {mf|ihn|sie} zu retten. Denn wer sich vom Zweifel von seinem Pfad abbringen ließ, ist zu fürchten. Er ist der Tod.
languages.original_text: But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had spawned it. Then Veni'Zacchary's incantation enveloped the Domin, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Doch {mf|sein|ihr} Kummer verschlimmerte sich nur noch, betäubte jedes Gefühl, denn groß war die Trauer des Schattens, der ihn geboren hatte. Dann umhüllte Veni'Zaccharys Beschwörung {mf|den|die} Domin, und dies allein reichte aus, um {mf|ihn|sie} zu retten. Denn wer sich vom Zweifel von seinem Pfad abbringen ließ, ist zu fürchten. Er ist der Tod.

languages.text: Pero su pesar solo aumentó, entumeciendo sus sentimientos, pues grande era el dolor de la sombra que lo había engendrado. Entonces, el cántico de Veni'Zacchary cubrió a{mf|l| la} Domin, y eso bastó para salvarl{mf|o|a}. Pues quien se deja llevar por las dudas es temible. Él es la muerte.
languages.original_text: But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had spawned it. Then Veni'Zacchary's incantation enveloped the Domin, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Pero su pesar solo aumentó, entumeciendo sus sentimientos, pues grande era el dolor de la sombra que lo había engendrado. Entonces, el cántico de Veni'Zacchary cubrió a{mf|l| la} Domin, y eso bastó para salvarl{mf|o|a}. Pues quien se deja llevar por las dudas es temible. Él es la muerte.

languages.text: けれど、{mf|彼|彼女}の悲しみは重くなるばかりで、すべての感情を麻痺させる。それを生み出した影の悲しみは余りにも大きかったために。そして、ヴェニ・ザカリーの呪文がエニムを包み込む。ドミンを救えるのはその呪文のみだった。疑心暗鬼に惑わされてたものは恐れられる。彼は死だ。
languages.original_text: But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had spawned it. Then Veni'Zacchary's incantation enveloped the Domin, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: けれど、{mf|彼|彼女}の悲しみは重くなるばかりで、すべての感情を麻痺させる。それを生み出した影の悲しみは余りにも大きかったために。そして、ヴェニ・ザカリーの呪文がエニムを包み込む。ドミンを救えるのはその呪文のみだった。疑心暗鬼に惑わされてたものは恐れられる。彼は死だ。

languages.text: 然而，{mf|他|她}心中的悲伤却变得越发沉重，麻痹了所有感官，因为阴影的痛苦是如此势不可挡。这个时候，帷者扎卡里的咒语环绕在了秘者身边，救了{mf|他|她}一命。任由怀疑将自己诱入歧途的人，将会成为可畏的敌人。祂便是死亡本身。
languages.original_text: But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had spawned it. Then Veni'Zacchary's incantation enveloped the Domin, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: 然而，{mf|他|她}心中的悲伤却变得越发沉重，麻痹了所有感官，因为阴影的痛苦是如此势不可挡。这个时候，帷者扎卡里的咒语环绕在了秘者身边，救了{mf|他|她}一命。任由怀疑将自己诱入歧途的人，将会成为可畏的敌人。祂便是死亡本身。

languages.text: Mais son chagrin ne fit que s'alourdir, noyant tout sentiment, car grande était la tristesse de l'ombre qui l'avait {mf|engendré|engendrée}. C'est alors que l'incantation de Veni'Zacchary enveloppa {mf|le|la} Domin et {mf|le|la} sauva. Car il faut craindre celui qui se laisse égarer par le doute. Il incarne la mort.
languages.original_text: But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had spawned it. Then Veni'Zacchary's incantation enveloped the Domin, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Mais son chagrin ne fit que s'alourdir, noyant tout sentiment, car grande était la tristesse de l'ombre qui l'avait {mf|engendré|engendrée}. C'est alors que l'incantation de Veni'Zacchary enveloppa {mf|le|la} Domin et {mf|le|la} sauva. Car il faut craindre celui qui se laisse égarer par le doute. Il incarne la mort.

languages.text: Fakat tüm hislerini uyuşturan hüznü daha da ağır basmıştı. Çünkü onu doğuran gölgenin hüznü muazzamdı. Ardından Veni'Zacchary'nin efsunlu sözleri Domin'i sarmaladı. Onu yalnızca bu sözler kurtarabilirdi. Çünkü kuşkunun kendisini yolundan saptırmasına müsaade edenlerden korkmak gerekir. O Ölüm'dür.
languages.original_text: But {mf|his|her} sorrow only grew heavier, numbing all feeling, for great was the sadness of the shadow that had spawned it. Then Veni'Zacchary's incantation enveloped the Domin, and it alone was able to save {mf|him|her}. For one who has let doubt lead them astray is to be feared. He is Death.
